BLOCKED.description: Student has an item with BLOCKED status

STUCK.description: Student in-progress on same item beyond threshold

INACTIVE.description: No progress file update within threshold

LONG_RUNNING.description: Lab taking longer than expected duration

DEADLINE_WARNING.description: Cohort deadline approaching within warning threshold

DEADLINE_CRITICAL.description: Cohort deadline approaching within critical threshold

cohortDeadlines._comment: Add cohort deadlines here in YYYY-MM: YYYY-MM-DD format
